name: Nocturnal (itch)
description:
The main character, named Robin, is a young boy who is suffering a trauma about a violent father who pushed the mother through the suicide act. He wakes up in a dark forest and, in his escaping trial, he finds traps and strange creatures, but he discovers to have special abilities too, which allow him to survive in that dangerous environment. Carrying on in his adventure he will meet a monstrous and cruel shadow who will keep to try to steal his soul until, on the top of a dilapidated tower, he will face it using his abilities to win his fears and finally wake up from that scary adventure which it will turn out to be just a nightmare. 

Features
  • Explore a dark forest searching for a way out;
  • Use your abilities to overcome mortal obstacles; 
  • Shrink yourself so that you can enter small or narrow openings;
  • Project a ghost in order to get over demonic walls or obstacles. Be faster, be invulnerable;
